changeSet.author: cupme
changeSet.sql: -- Insert Order items INSERT INTO order_item (order_id, protocol_id, product_id, quantity) SELECT MAX(id), protocol_id, NULL, 1 FROM (SELECT 7480 AS protocol_id UNION ALL SELECT 7484 UNION ALL SELECT 7485 UNION ALL SELECT 7486 UNION ALL SELECT 7487 UNION ALL SELECT 7488 UNION ALL SELECT 7490 UNION ALL SELECT 7492 UNION ALL SELECT 7494 UNION ALL SELECT 7496 UNION ALL SELECT 7506 UNION ALL SELECT 7513 UNION ALL SELECT 7522 UNION ALL SELECT 7527 UNION ALL SELECT 7529 UNION ALL SELECT 7530 UNION ALL SELECT 7531 UNION ALL SELECT 7533 UNION ALL SELECT 7535 UNION ALL SELECT 7537 UNION ALL SELECT 7539 UNION ALL SELECT 7541 UNION ALL SELECT 7543 UNION ALL SELECT 7544 UNION ALL SELECT 7550 UNION ALL SELECT 7552 UNION ALL SELECT 7553 UNION ALL SELECT 7554 UNION ALL SELECT 7555) AS protocols;
